title: SOLD: 1887 Spalding Sporting Goods Baseball Currency - Chicago Team BGS Authentic
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1887 Spalding Sporting Goods Baseball Currency - Chicago Team BGS Authentic
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is an extremely rare 1887 Spalding Sporting Goods Currency - Chicago BB Club picturing HOF'ers: Albert Spalding, Cap Anson & John Clarkson. This beauty has been authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review enlarged scans of the front and back of the item for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the firsdt person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]

posts.post_title: REDUCED: 1887 Spalding Sporting Goods Baseball Currency - Chicago Team BGS Authentic
